title: E37 Kyle Columbus and The Napoleon Complex but with Cannibalism
description: Thanks, Mr. Bagans. In episode 37, Em talks about a self-sabotaging building called the St. Augustine Lighthouse and Christine razzle-dazzles with the story Issei Sagawa, the creepy cannibal who roams free (and whines about it) to this day. And that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
